L4D is a solid linear zombie survival game. While I do recommend this one, you are far better off just buying L4D2 as all of the levels from this game are present in the sequel.

Left 4 Dead 1 has more of zombie apocalyptic vibe than Left 4 Dead 2. The maps are all at night, which adds to the dark atmosphere of the game. The music when leaving the saferoom/safezone gives that unsettling feeling of what's to come. The music when the horde arrives gives the feeling of their unrelenting force, to make you wonder when will they ever stop coming. My favorite campaign is Dead Air, due to the fact the survivors are desperate to escape the city, desperate enough to check out an airport even though it's highly unlikely to have an escape plane due to the fact that a airport is always the first place people go to escape the apocalypse and never succeed due to crowds and the infection benefiting from the large amount of people in these places.
ta bien  por que siento que hay mas zombies que en el 2

Great atmosphere and a good soundtrack. If you like any other zombie game or you would like to play something with your friends, I would definitely recommend the L4D series

[b]"Left 4 Dead" wants to offer you a seamless four players co-op fast pace shooting experience and succeeds its goal. Killing hordes of zombies was never more satisfying. The gameplay is simple yet effective, the levels are exceptionally designed, the co-op works great and the zombies are really nasty. It could be even better if it had a bigger variety of weapons and a basic plot to support the campaign mode. Nevertheless you will have a lot of fun playing it with your friends.


Manometer: 7/10[/b]


The good
- Great co-op mode that works seamlessly. Each member is vital for the rest of the team. You will have some really good time with your friends.
- Well designed post apocalyptic world. It is remarkable how it guides you (with lights and marks) through each level. There are a lot of hidden places to explore too.
- Good looking graphics for its age. The lighting is so atmospheric. It is fully playable till nowadays.
- Simple yet effective gameplay with cool fast paced combats. It never lets you get bored.
- These are some of the best crafted zombies I have seen in a video game. Each zombie type comes with different skills. Sometimes they just stand in a dark corner but usually they attack running in hordes and giving you moments of real agony.
- Nice sound design. Zombies' creepy screams and fast music give the tone.
- It is extraordinary that although the game feels simplistic, it finally manages to offer you plenty of satisfaction. Killing zombies feels great. They fall down, dismember, spill blood in an extremely splatter way (you have to try the grenade).
- Good sense of humor. There are some hilarious hidden jokes here and there (like the graffities). The characters often tell some inspired jokes too.
- It packs several game modes that increase its replayability value.
- You can find several add-ons and extra campaigns on-line.

The bad
- A basic plot in the campaign mode could add some extra interest and a little bit of drama.
- There are only few weapons to choose from. A bigger variety could probably give it more depth and some more play styles.
- There are some minor collision issues. You will sometimes get stuck in an object or fall from a narrow passage. 
- There are only few default campaigns (but you can try some of the add-on campaigns).
- The single player mode is decent but it has no real purpose and gets boring after a while. Also sometimes the NPCs refuse to follow you and some others they just delay you (a bit annoying when you are inside a safe house waiting for them to enter).
《关于我的人机队友各个比我强这件事》

Всем привет,с вами K4MNEV Show.сегодня будет обзор на игру Left 4 Dead.Познакомился с этой игрой в 2010-2011 году,когда я был мелкий.Залипал сильно в эту игру,она настолько меня затягивала,своим сюжетом,графикой на те годы,багами и многим другим,прошёл я эту часть за 8 почти часов,даже есть набор со второй частью,меня настолько бесил финал,я ели как справлялся с этими ботами-союзниками,которые ходили за мной,но друг мне помог пройти финал,даже был случай,что меня танк толкнул к генератору,и я успел его активировать)Что хочу,сказать,игра шикарная,сервера ещё живы(слава богу),советую пройти эту игру,кто хочет со мной пройти эту игру,добавляйтесь,постараюсь добавить)Все пока,спасибо,что прочитали мой отзыв
